title: Create lawn mowing and car washing service booking application

requirements.text: Create a service booking system that allows customers to request lawn mowing or car washing services

quotes: A lawn mowing and a car washing business.

acceptanceCriteria: Customers can select either lawn mowing or car washing service
Customers can submit a booking request with their details
Service requests are stored in the backend

requirements.text: Implement a booking form that captures customer name, contact information, service type, preferred date, and address

quotes: A lawn mowing and a car washing business.

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for name, email/phone, service selection, date picker, and address
Form validates required fields before submission
Users receive confirmation after successful booking

requirements.text: Create backend data model to store service bookings with fields for customer information, service type, date, address, and booking status

quotes: A lawn mowing and a car washing business.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores booking records with all required fields
Each booking has a unique identifier
Booking status can track pending, confirmed, or completed states

requirements.text: Display a list of all service bookings with filtering options for service type and status

quotes: A lawn mowing and a car washing business.

acceptanceCriteria: All bookings are displayed in a list or table format
Users can filter by lawn mowing or car washing services
Users can filter by booking status
Each booking shows customer details, service type, date, and current status

requirements.text: Implement functionality to update booking status from pending to confirmed or completed

quotes: A lawn mowing and a car washing business.

acceptanceCriteria: Service providers can change booking status
Status updates persist in the backend
UI reflects status changes immediately

requirements.text: Design a professional, clean visual theme with earthy greens and bright automotive blues that reflects both outdoor lawn care and car washing services, with clear typography and an organized layout suitable for service booking
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme combines natural greens with clean blues
Typography is clear and professional
Layout is organized and easy to navigate
Design conveys trustworthiness and cleanliness

requirements.text: Display generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated including service icons and hero banner
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are properly referenced in components
Images load correctly in the application

constraints: Use React with TypeScript for frontend
All backend logic must remain in a single actor file
nonGoals: Real-time chat between customers and service providers

required: Lawn mower icon in clean line art style with green accents (lawn-mower-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Car with water droplets and shine icon in clean line art style with blue accents (car-wash-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Hero banner showing a split scene of a manicured lawn on the left and a sparkling clean car on the right, professional and inviting (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
